textAfterTable: Game Overview Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows is a 3D multi-player action game developed by Red Fly Studio and released on Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3, and Xbox 360. The game is based off of the ongoing Nickelodeon TV series "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles," and follows the turtles on their quest to defeat the villainous Shredder.
